column2: and you can easily split with another person.  The first time I ordered the crunchy chicken sandwich
column3: and had enough leftovers for lunch for my husband and me the next day.  The sandwich was really good
column4: but I don't seek out chicken to eat
column5: and only tried it because it was so highly rated by other yelp reviewers.  Honestly
column7: I don't plan on ordering it again.  Chicken is just my least favorite meat.
